item.description:
As most of you know, I'm a pistol instructor at Major Waldron's. Many of you have asked to be updated when training courses are held, therefore I will post them as events.

This is the NRA Basic Pistol Course that teaches:

  • Safe firearm handling
  • Firearm parts and operation
  • Ammunition and its function
  • Shooting fundamentals and an opportunity to develop them on the range
  • How to select, clean and store a firearm
  • Review of various activities to help participants develop and improve their shooting skills
    [/lit]

    Course Details:

    • Course cost is $60, paid in full and in advance to reserve your spot
    • Course is 2 days, Sept 13th and Sept 14th typically from 8am - 5pm both days
    • Pistols and ammo are supplied by the club, you do need to supply Eye & Ear Protection
    • Class size is limited, sign-up will begin 30 days before class starts.


    If you are interested in attending this course please contact for further details and payment:
    Ron Thomas
    ronthomas@verizon.net

    As a note, all Instructors at Major Waldron's are volunteers and are not paid for their time. We believe that education and the proper use and handling of firearms is essential. If you have other questions that you want to ask me, please ask away!

    Please click here for additional directions to the club.
item.name: NRA Basic Pistol (Firearms Training / Certification)
